channel.title: Container and Layouts - Ebiten UI
channel.description: Any UI in this library consists of containers that are nested in each other. Containers are located in widget package. 1import "github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/widget" There is a single container type which can be created like this. 1c := widget.NewContainer() You can compose containers in each other. The order of addition does not matter. 1shirt := widget.NewContainer() 2shelf := widget.NewContainer() 3store := widget.NewContainer() 4 5shelf.AddChild(shirt) 6store.AddChild(shelf) The container have several options to setup. 1c.SetPadding(10) 2c.SetBorder(10) 3c.SetBorderRadius(10) 4c.SetBackgroundColor("#000000") 5c.SetBackgroundImage("https://www.google.com/images/branding/google
